title: 1923 Chicago Cardinals season
text:
The <a href="1923%20NFL%20season">1923</a> <a href="Chicago%20Cardinals">Chicago Cardinals</a> season was their fourth in the <a href="National%20Football%20League">league</a>. The team failed to improve on their <a href="1922%20Chicago%20Cardinals%20season">previous output</a> of 8–3, losing four games. They finished sixth in the league.
Schedule.
On November 25th against Akron, the Cardinals became the only team in NFL history to score 4 points in a game.
